attires.name: Batik Shirt
attires.description: A versatile shirt made from traditional Indonesian batik fabric. Patterns and colors vary widely by region and occasion.

attires.name: Kebaya
attires.description: An elegant traditional blouse, often made of sheer material and adorned with intricate embroidery or lace. Worn with a sarong or batik skirt.

attires.name: Baju Koko
attires.description: A collarless long-sleeved shirt, often worn by Muslim men, especially during religious holidays like Eid al-Fitr.

attires.name: Surjan
attires.description: A traditional Javanese long-sleeved shirt for men, featuring a striped pattern and a unique collar design.
